data.news_body: In compliance with regulation 30 read with schedule III, of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a virtual conference call to be hosted by B&K securities on Monday, May 23, 2022 shall be attended by the Company. A copy of presentation is enclosed for your reference. This information is also being uploaded on the Company's Website www.sparkminda.com
